enchant_revised.configuration.title: Enchanting Revised Configuration
enchant_revised.configuration.enableAnvi: Remove XP costs from anvil recipes.
enchant_revised.configuration.enableNoBo:
Don't increase enchantment level when combining two identical enchantments.

Turning this off will make high level enchantments too easy to acquire through the Enchanting Altar.
enchant_revised.configuration.repairNeth: Repair netherite armor and tools with diamonds.
Repair netherite armor and tools with netherite scrap.
enchant_revised.configuration.repairDela: Delay in ticks before 1 durability is repaired.

Repair Delay is reduced by this many ticks for each level of Mending above 1.

This mod doesn't provide higher levels of Mending but other mods might.
Removes vanilla XP from the game.
enchant_revised.configuration.enableEnch: Should the vanilla Enchanting Table cost XP to use?

enchant_revised.configuration.replaceMen: Replace the Mending enchantment with a repair-over-time effect.
enchant_revised.configuration.enableEcho:
Add Echoing Book trade to librarians.

(Server only. Reload required.)
enchant_revised.configuration.enableLapi:
Add Lapis Lazuli trade to librarians.

(Server only. Reload required.)
enchant_revised.configuration.disableEnc:
Disable vanilla Enchanted Book trade on librarians.

(Server only. Reload required.)
enchant_revised.configuration.disableBot: Removes the Bottle O' Enchanting from loot tables. Existing bottles are unaffected.
enchant_revised.configuration.enableReci: Show the recipe book button for the Enchanting Altar?
